website_summaries.verdict: This contemporary burner has a straightforward design and useful features, but also comes with a few potentially frustrating quirks.
pros: Heats up quickly, yet turns off automatically when pots and pans are removed from the surface
Trim, modern build with simple controls
cons: Cooktop finish is prone to scratches

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: This Cooktop is superior to the one advertised on TV. I bought this one as a gift for someone else. I then received the one advertised on TV as a gift for me! The True Induction brand cooktop is not only 25% faster to heat a gallon of water, it also has a much nicer control surface. The True Induction top is solid and crumbs can't fall into the edges.... the Other Brand has edges which can trap crumbs and grime. My sister loved this for making a white sauce. I used it under a pressure cooker. It is very easy to keep the temps right where you want them.
customer_reviews.author: hisierra4

customer_reviews.title: So fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. It's fast and efficient. The only thing as warned is that it does not work with all pots. Has anyone tried an induction interface disk? I've read reviews on Amazon and the reviews are from no good to excellent. I would like to try one so that she can use all her pots but don't want to waste my time if they really don't work.
customer_reviews.author: NewYorkerAtHeart

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry I didn't purchase this sooner. Use it everyday. Being portable, I can take it camping: to the beach, etc. Quiet and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Works great (just a bit loud when the fan is on) ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great (just a bit loud when the fan is on) We use this cook top along with a cast iron Dutch Oven instead of a crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an induction cooktop for the RV (when we're hooked up to 110) and this one is a winner. It looks great so I plan to keep it on the counter in my home kitchen when we're not using the RV. It's different from using gas or electric so there was a little trial and error but it's very user friendly and the timer is a great feature. Can't wait to use it for canning. This is an excellent product and it was delivered almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jangee

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: This induction cook top is my new best friend. I have given up the stove top (which is brand new btw) and have adopted the induction cooktop for my own. The nice thing is that the wife has the stove top all to herself now and I have my induction. No more crowding at the stove for us!
customer_reviews.author: S. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic induction plate
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic induction plate. I used it while I was remodeling my kitchen. Now my daughter has it and it hurts her only stove for the time being. She loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Siemon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Looks great and True is the brand in ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks great and True is the brand in all new RV's so I guess you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Josh Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Great new way to cook
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes cooking much faster and more controlled. The only problem I have is that when cooking a large pan of foods, it will seem to cool down and can not catch up. I guess it needs more power. I am think installing a built in version in my new kitchen will solve this problem. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dood

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to add an induction cooktop to the kitchen without the expense of replacing the stove. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn L.

customer_reviews.title: tru induction cooktop
customer_reviews.text: unit has worked to my expectations 100%. i use my greswold 8'' skillet and it cooks any thing i put in it. easy to clean and easy to use. love it.
customer_reviews.author: dragoonjohn

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking kitchen equipment
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra burner and this meets my needs. I wanted to use it primary for pasta at the sink. Boiling on my regular cooktop, the moisture covers the microwave above it even using the fan. It is also difficult to carry a heavy, hot pot to my sink. It looks modern enough to leave out in my kitchen so it's ready to use but compact enough to store in the pantry. I already had stainless steel cookware so I don't need any special pans to use on it. It has other uses besides my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Mochalover

customer_reviews.title: Performs as Described
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use during kitchen reno. This has allowed us to continue enjoying home cooked meals versus two months of nightly pizza delivery. Very happy with this purchase. Its mobility is a plus and can be tucked away when not in use. Will also be good to have as an extra burner for larger meals once reno is complete.
customer_reviews.author: ProductReview

customer_reviews.title: True Induction Burner
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Would buy another, and have recommended this product to others . Cooking became fun again. Stanley Kowalczyk
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Kowalczyk

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great for melting ingredients for our homemade body butter and is easy to clean because of the one piece top. I wish the product was manufactured in the USA and had a little more precise temperature control but over all this product has worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: J. Rudd

customer_reviews.title: HOT DAMN
customer_reviews.text: CSA / UL approved for counter top insert - works well to expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a test.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it frequently, but when I do... I like it a lot! I bought it to test out cooking on an induction burner before I purchase a full size stove to replace the electric one I have now. Pros: Heats as fast, if not faster, than a gas stove (and DEFINITELY faster than electric). Easy to clean. More efficient than other cooktops. Cons: The fan makes noise, not too loud, but you hear it. It's almost like have your overhead fan on.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Katz

customer_reviews.title: The unit is fast to heat up, but you ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit is fast to heat up, but you can't use the readout for the right temp. You have to know what you want and check the temp with a temp. gage and once you find the right setting you might have to set it to 200* to get 180* or 220* depending on witch way yours is off but it will repeat once you know the numbers you nead!
customer_reviews.author: T. B

customer_reviews.title: Lose the old electric and gas burners, in with the induction!
customer_reviews.text: We switched to induction a couple of years ago and havent looked back. We originally purchased another brand that just did not last. So far these work exceptionally well and appear to be very well built. They might cost a slight premium to the other brands, but the build quality far exceeds it. We now have two and love them. It's great being able to easily cook with stable temperatures and have made my pancakes a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy N. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Energy Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I have only use this one time but it worked perfectly and worked with all of my cookware. After reading all of the reviews on different models I chose this one based off reviews. I live in the area where power can go out for a long time. I have backup batteries and I thought I would be able to use this with an emergency battery which other people said they had. It has a large surface area so even my bigger pots fit.
customer_reviews.author: urblaze

customer_reviews.title: It works just like our dual
customer_reviews.text: We already have a dual built in True Induction stovetop in our RV but it won't work off the inverter. We needed something that we could plug in and use while we were off the plug "boondocking". This true induction portable works exactly like our dual. It's perfect
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I used this instead of my RV stove, especially in the summer. It won't heat up the RV like a propane stove will. I need to get another one as I gave my other one away with my previous RV. I miss it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine O.

customer_reviews.title: Very Efficient Cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Cooktop works fine and as advertised. The fan is a bit noisey and we could not find the exact setting for simmering. One too high would bring to a boil, one too low would not simmer. We wanted this cooktop to experiment with induction before remodeling our kitchen. Whether we choose to stay with gas or install an induction cooktop, we will keep and use this single burner as appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Louis S. Carrio

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and doesn't run at low wattages
customer_reviews.text: The beeping is incredibly annoying. Also, it doesn't operate at lower wattages as advertised. Even on the low setting it pulls over 1kw. All the safety warnings on the surface are tacky, I've never owned a stove that had warnings all over it.
customer_reviews.author: sdbuck

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Until I bought this induction burner I had never used one. I was pleasantly surprised with it. All of my pans or at least 95% are induction usable. I have not used it but to boil water so far but I intend to use this for candy making etc.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two of these over the past 3 months and have been happy with their performance. They are easy to clean and heat up quickly. They seem to be more powerful than the induction burner I was using before. We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: It is everything I hoped it wouldbe
customer_reviews.text: For the first time I m comfortable with frying because of the safety features. My husband loves fried chicken and I would never make it because I was not comfortable with the heat settings on my electric range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it still works like 1st day
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years of use, it still works like 1st day!!!
customer_reviews.author: vicu9mx

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only negative is the lowest setting is not ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this in our RV for almost a year and we use it almost every day, we are full timers. Have not used the propane stove since we got the True Induction. Works great. Only negative is the lowest setting is not low enough some of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Mann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this only after the Chef Todd Single Burner (from HSN) went defunct after one use and there was a problem in sending in back. So we gave up and went on a search for a better one, and did we find it! Heats beautiful, great timer and temperature setting functions. It arrived quickly and well packed. REceived notification by e mail that this company received our registration. Keep in mind it is an induction plat so not all pans will work on it. But we are very pleased at this purchase. Would do it all over again!
customer_reviews.author: A. HollowayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A KEEPER
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Consistant. I like it better than gas. I've bought several and had to return because of poor performance. THis one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: it still is simple and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it three times already and it kept breaking and got out of order and when I called the company and the AS and I never recieved a call and using it is very simple and at ease and even though it got out of order and did not work at all, it still is simple and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: KIM JUNGSUK

customer_reviews.title: 85 Year Old Mom
customer_reviews.text: Downsized Mom is very happy with this unit so far. She needs a safe and efficient way of making her Irish tea and breakfast. The unit is easy to clean, very attractive, and worked well out of the box. Not sure the difference between heat and temperature modes but either seem to do the trick. Good warranty, and comes with a 2 prong 120vac plug which is beneficial for old ungrounded receptacles. Make sure the little tiny rubber feet aren't loose.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK KOZAKIEWICZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Induction Cooker
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I love this induction cooker is because it saves me time. When I get home from work to make dinner, I just want to make a quick meal and relax. So with this induction cooker, I can boil water in half the time. I no longer have to wait around several minutes for my water to boil. I mean those few minutes matter to me, especially after a long day of work. I also really enjoy the sleek look. There are many other benefits to the induction cooker, but the time saving aspect really won me over. Buy it - it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: kind of junk to me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October and I only used it a few times, maybe twice a week or so, and it stopped working last week. Not a good buy I would say, and can't get a hold of anyone for warranty just a run around.
customer_reviews.author: maxx

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only works with my iron skillet, not the stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lanford

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN  AFTER 9 USES
customer_reviews.text: This burner worked great for about 5 months or 9 uses and now it does not work at all. Keep you receipt.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT A PHILLIPS

product_meta.title: True Induction Energy Efficient Single Burner Induction Cooktop
product_meta.description:
The True Induction P3D single-burner induction cooktop has a glass-ceramic top with a 1,600W burner and a control panel and is suitable on a countertop for heating and cooking food using stainless steel or cast iron cookware (sold separately). The heat on induction cooktops typically can be adjusted more quickly and precisely than on electric cooktops, and induction cooktops typically use less energy than electric or gas cooktops and can be wiped clean once cool. Glass-ceramic withstands quick temperature changes. The burner can be adjusted from 150 to 450 degrees F and has 10 quick-touch settings for precise heating. The timer can be set for 0 to 150 minutes. The cooktop measures 12 x 15 x 2-1/2 inches (W x L x H). (W is width, the horizontal distance from left to right; L is length, the horizontal distance from front to back; H is height, the vertical distance from lowest to highest point.) It is rated for 120V.

Sequoia Brands manufactures products under the True Induction, Sentry Safety Pool Fence, and Chicago Food Machinery brands, among others. The company, founded in 2010, is headquartered in Odessa, FL.
feature_bullets: Overheating sensors recognize when no cookware is present and turns off.
TRUE induction brand is used in Winnebago
Timer function & exact temperature setting for precise cooking

Induction elements use electricity to produce a magnetic field that reacts with the iron in metal cookware - including cast iron and magnetic stainless steel pans - and transfers the heat to the cookware
ADA Compliant/ True Induction cook tops are 90% energy efficient
